9.22.19  11:08 am   Do you think the Venusian cloud city model or the Mars colonization model provides a better long term hope for humanity outside Earth?

9.22.19  11:07 am   I've been thinking for a long time about posting music (classical)-related videos to YouTube, but stop before I even start because I talk myself out of it. "Oh you don't have the right equipment, or money for better equipment. Only 2% of the US population claim to be interested in classical music and who knows what percentage (10%?) of them would even potentially watch your videos?" How did/do you strangle these voices in their sleep?

9.22.19  10:39 am   I have a theory. If your main thing that you like to do is music, which is communication of emotion, and you have taught your self all about it, that means you have trained your emotional side of your brain well. That leaves more room for your logical side of the brain that deals with reasoning. One of your other passions is always to be reasonable. I think when you trained yourself when music so much, you developed a good balance of emotion and logic. Do you think this might be true?

9.21.19  11:01 pm   lmao isn't this pathetic? one of my work friends blew me off and now i feel like shit. i went through all the people I could potentially talk to about it in my head, friends, acquaintances, counsellor, family, etc. and there were obvious red flags why i didn't want to (would gossip, not close enough friend, would tell me it's my fault for being an antisocial freak, would try to console me by going on abt his problems being worse, etc.). and at the end of it, the literal ONLY person in the world i feel like i can tell is you, here, on this page, even though we don't even know each other lmao. anyway i feel like a piece of garbage but sending you this makes me feel like less of that. thanks dude
